13.text:
-The app now counts how often it has been launched since the last update, and since install
-Fixed unintended crashes on newer Android versions, introduced in the previous update. Thanks to everyone reporting the errors and submitting crash reports!
-Fixed typos
-Updated localization files

12.text:
-If you lack notification permissions, the app will let you know and provide ways to grant them from the main screen
-Updated external storage permissions and access
-Moved permission review options to the 'general' section of settings menu
-Improved app stability
-Fixed typos
-Updated localization files

11.text:
-Supported Night mode (when supported and enabled by your device)
-Added a preview to the date formation settings
-Fixed typos
-Updated localization files

10.text:
-New look for the main menu! Replaced the old list structure with a card design
-Delete notes via the note's menu or long-press it
-More note context actions: Browse URLs, dial phone numbers and send mails
-Those actions are also available from within notifications
-Fixed a bug when reversing notifications
-Fixed a bug when detecting the lastest backup file
-Updated icons
-Updated credits
-Bugfixes and performance improvements
-Fixed typos
-Updated localization files

9.text:
-[Android 7+] Added support for Android 7 notification channels
-Tapping on a notification now opens the assigned note
-If a note contains a single weblink, it can now be opened from the notification
-Backups can now be scheduled automatically (via the settings menu)
-Updated some texts in the settings menu
-Updated targeted Android version
-Updated dialog icons
-Updated localization files

8.text:
-[Android 7+] Added support for Android 7 notification styles. Try it out by using grouped notifications and expand one at a time.
Added a 'disable note' button for notifications
-Added an external update feed, in case you don't want to get update news from Google Play. See the 'About' section in the settings for details.
-Added a counter that counts the days since the last update
-System notification settings available from within the app
-Backups can be made and restored from within the main screen
-Updated localization files

7.text:
-Arrangement of notes in the notification and app now match correctly
-Weblinks and URLs within notes can now be browsed from within this app
-Updated notification bar icon
-Fixed a crash when trying to generate QR codes from empty notes

6.text:
-Notes displayed as QR codes can now be shared with other apps
-Added this dialog to keep you informed about changes and new features. You can view this changelog again in the 'about' section in the app settings!
-The order of all displayed notifications can reversed
-Minor improvements and bug fixes

5.text:
-Replaced 'fontawesome'-icons with material-design icons
-Added more icons to the options menu
-Notes can now be displayed as a QR Code
-Minor improvements and bug fixes
